name: Mega Sales
description:
" GO OUT THERE AND GET ME SOME STUFF YOU LAZY BRAT " 

was what your angry wife told you to do. That's right, you are married and now your mission is to go to the supermarket during the MEGA SALES and get all the item that your wife told you to get. Things won't be that easy since now there are a bunch of married man who was also put in the same situation as you. Once the supermarket open, be FAST, GRAB all the item and don't forget to PUNCH other men to survive in this cruel arena where everyone will fight for there own self.
